author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're trying out something new with a LIVE GMG REVIEW! 

HArdware is the upcoming new Quick to Play combined-arms game from Modiphius with its own set of 10mm miniatures in plastic-resin. Come hang out while I review the preview rules and the new models before the official launch of their campaign. 

Modiphius are the publishers for the prestige editions of such favourites as Rangers of Shadow Deep, Five Leagues and Parsecs and a pile of great RPGs. They also handle all the Bethesda licensed titles such as Fallout and Elder Scrolls. This is their first foray into a new scale!

Thanks to Chris as the folks at Modiphius for the advance copies to review. 


GO check out all the new channels!

GMG Inside Tabletop
youtube.com/@GMGInsideTabletop

GMG Throwback Thursdays
youtube.com/@GMGThrowbackThursdays

GMG Games Workshop Games
youtube.com/@GMGGamesWorkshopGames

GMG Infinity x TacAware
youtube.com/@GMGInfinityxTacticalAwareness

Intro music 'Retrofuture Nasty' by Kevin McLeod
title: GMG Reviews - HARDWARE by Modiphis (LIVE!)

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Black Site Studios has more content out for HAMETSU, the Solo and CoOp Demon Hunting game in feudal japan. Take the sword of a legend into a solo mission through hell or team up with your friends to discover why the endless rain is slowly sinking Post Cataclysm Japan! Let's check them out. 

Check out the HAMETSU Rulebook and expansions can be found HERE: https://blacksitestudio.com/en-ca/products/hametsu-core-rulebook

Thanks to Ben and Connor and Doug for the new books to review!

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-categ
title: HAMETSU: Musashi and HAMETSU Ryu and the Rain by Black Site Studios
